duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and implement business plans to increase sales and revenue from new and existing market segments and channels.
Build and nurture relationships with stakeholders in the feed manufacturing, pre-mixing, and ingredient distribution channels.
Participate in marketing, sales, and customer support activities to reach objectives and revenue targets.
Translate customer needs into business strategy to capture commercial sales.
Recognize and pursue new market segments and business development opportunities.
Monitor market development activities to align with company business goals.
Promote product market recognition with technical knowledge and market research or intelligence.
Independently handle complex issues with minimal supervision, while escalating the most complex issues to appropriate staff.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in a related field or equivalent experience.
Minimum of four years of related work experience.
Ability to travel up to 75% of the time, including overnight travel up to 50%.
Proven ability to sell and/or provide technical service/support to feed manufacturers, pre-mixers, and/or ingredient distributors.
Master's degree or other post-secondary degree (Preferred).
Five to ten years of experience in combined sales, marketing, and business development (Preferred).
